name: Jaywalker Extreme
description:
Run like mad across many busy roads, it's important that you don't get hit by the cars. Do not fall into the water. There are a total of 3 maps to play, you get 5 lives per map.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

W - Run forward A - Rotate to the left D - Rotate to the right

* Made for a gamejam

** Requires a browser that supports WebGL / WebAssembly

*** First time load can be slow - if it freezes or gives error then just refresh the webpage and it will resume downloading the game files to cache
